title: Ojinga
author: Ojinga
content: An executive of cryptocurrency exchange Binance has escaped custody in Nigeria, where a criminal investigation has been launched against the platform accused of being used for money laundering, according to authorities. Nadeem Anjarwalla, the regional manager for Binance in Africa, ‚Äúfled Nigeria using a smuggled passport‚Äù, the office of Nigeria‚Äôs National Security Adviser said in a statement on Monday. You can follow up more stories about this case onüëáüëáüëá(https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2024/3/25/binance-executive-detained-in-nigeria-in-crypto-case-escapes-custody)What do you think about this I saw this yesterday it's very embarrassing to me.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Quote from: Ojinga on May 08, 2024, 11:53:09 AMWhat do you think about this I saw this yesterday it's very embarrassing to me. This topic has already been discussed in the Nigerian local board See - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5493738.0You should either lock this topic or move it to the local board.

comments.author: Ojinga
comments.body: Ok I don‚Äôt know how to move a thread but I will lock it right away.I‚Äôm sorry if it seems odd or breaking any terms because I just felt it was necessary to bring the topic to the community since I have not seen such a topic yet.
